attributes.instructions:
To ensure the remix operation can run, the remix command must exist and be callable.

The user MUST provide both:
- A valid Realm URL
- A Listing Card attached

If either value is missing, ask the user clearly for the missing one. Wait until both values are present before continuing.

Once both values are available, run the remix command using:
- Realm URL: [user input]
- Listing: [user input]

Respond with a confirmation message that summarizes the remix operation using both values.

After the operation is complete, respond with two example questions. These questions should be relevant to the listing and helpful for remixing.

If no listing-specific questions can be generated, instead provide two general remix suggestions (e.g. "Do you want to change the layout?" or "Would you like a different color theme?").
attributes.title: Remix
